Steps.Message: Update at 06:38 - Our engineers have left site due to coming to the end of their shifts, we will be sending further specialist staff to site this morning to continue with progress to the underground network fault. To allow them time to arrive and complete the work, we're estimating to have power restored between 10:30 and 11:30. We're sorry for the disruption this power cut will be causing, especially the impact it will be having on the start to your day. If you have any concerns about this please do not hesitate to call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We will work to fix the problem as quickly and safely as possible.

We became aware of a power cut at 06:14. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 06:38 - Our engineers have left site due to coming to the end of their shifts, we will be sending further specialist staff to site this morning to continue with progress to the underground network fault. To allow them time to arrive and complete the work, we're estimating to have power restored between 10:30 and 11:30. We're sorry for the disruption this power cut will be causing, especially the impact it will be having on the start to your day. If you have any concerns about this please do not hesitate to call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We will work to fix the problem as quickly and safely as possible.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
